content.description:
Different polysaccharides are used by plants for energy storage and structural support. The molecular structures for two common polysaccharides are shown in Figure 1. Starch is used by plants for energy storage, and cellulose provides structural support for cell walls. The monomer used to construct both molecules is glucose.

A study determined the effect of two different digestive enzymes, <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>, on these two polysaccharides. Table 1 presents the data from the study.

Table 1. Effect of Enzymes <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> on Cellulose and Starch

Mammals do not produce digestive enzyme <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. However, sheep and cattle are two types of mammals that contain microorganisms in their digestive tract that produce enzyme <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.
content.question: Which of the following would most likely occur if cattle lost the ability to maintain a colony of microorganisms in their digestive tract?

choices.label: Cattle would no longer be able to synthesize cellulose.
Cattle would have to convert cellulose to starch before digesting it.
Cattle would have to start producing enzyme <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> without the help of the bacteria.
Cattle would no longer be able to use cellulose as a primary source of glucose.

content.answer: Cattle would no longer be able to use cellulose as a primary source of glucose.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
